named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByParentJobunitIdAndJobId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.parentJobId = :parentJobId AND a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobId ASC

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByJobunitId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByJobType
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.jobType = :jobType ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId OR a.srcFacilityId = :facilityId OR a.destFacilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobParamMstEntity.findByJobunitId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobParamMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.paramId

named-query.name: JobParamInfoEntity.findBySessionId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobParamInfoEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.paramId

named-query.name: JobParamInfoEntity.findBySessionIdAndParamId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobParamInfoEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.id.paramId = :paramId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.paramId

named-query.name: JobStartJobInfoEntity.findByTargetJobId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobStartJobInfoEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.id.targetJobId = :targetJobId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.targetJobunitId, a.id.targetJobId, a.id.targetJobType, a.id.targetJobEndValue

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.findUnendSessions
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionEntity a JOIN a.jobSessionJobEntities b WHERE a.jobId = b.id.jobId AND a.jobunitId = b.id.jobunitId AND b.status NOT IN (300,301) ORDER BY b.startDate ASC

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findChild
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND a.parentJobId = :parentJobId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByJobSessionId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.status = :status ORDER BY a.startDate ASC

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findBySessionStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a JOIN a.jobSessionEntity b WHERE a.id.jobId = b.jobId AND a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.status = :status ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findBySessionStatuses
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a JOIN a.jobSessionEntity b WHERE a.id.jobId = b.jobId AND a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.status IN :statuses ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByParentStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND a.parentJobId = :parentJobId AND a.status = :status ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByStartDate
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND a.parentJobId = :parentJobId ORDER BY a.startDate

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByStatusStartIsNull
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a WHERE a.status = :status AND a.startDate IS NULL ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.facilityId

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a WHERE a.status = :status ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.facilityId

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByFacilityIdStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a WHERE a.status = :status AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.startupTime = :startupTime ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.facilityId

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByDifferentStartuptime
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a WHERE a.status = :status AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.startupTime != :startupTime AND a.startupTime != 0 ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.facilityId

named-query.name: JobScheduleEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobScheduleEntity a ORDER BY a.scheduleId

named-query.name: JobScheduleEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobScheduleEntity a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.scheduleId

named-query.name: JobScheduleEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobScheduleEntity a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.scheduleId

named-query.name: JobFileCheckEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobFileCheckEntity a ORDER BY a.scheduleId

named-query.name: JobFileCheckEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobFileCheckEntity a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.scheduleId

named-query.name: JobFileCheckEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobFileCheckEntity a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.scheduleId

named-query.name: JobEditEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobEditEntity a ORDER BY a.jobunitId

named-query.name: JobEditEntity.findByEditSession
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobEditEntity a WHERE a.editSession = :editSession ORDER BY a.jobunitId
